original_title: A veces imagino puedo ver la luz entrelazando el alambre
overview: There is a distance, emotionally not only physically, between Jimena and her grandmother, Miri. This is a way to try and get closer, to understand, to accept, mixing past and present she tries to find her grandmother, in an attempt to reconnect with something that once existed, but that it no longer does.
tagline: This is a way to try and get closer, to understand, to accept, mixing past and present she tries to find her grandmother.
title: At Times I Imagine Seeing The Light  Reflect Upon The Wire
